1.The Trade: Atlanta Hawks acquire Rudy Gobert and Joe Ingles from the Utah Jazz for Clint Capela, De'Andre Hunter, Kevin Huerter and the No. 6 overall pick in 2020

2.The Trade: Boston Celtics acquire Myles Turner and Jeremy Lamb from the Indiana Pacers for Gordon Hayward, the No. 14 pick in the 2020 draft and a 2021 first-round pick

3.The Trade: Brooklyn Nets acquire Joel Embiid from Philadelphia 76ers for Caris LeVert, Spencer Dinwiddie, Jarrett Allen, the No. 19 pick in the 2020 draft and a 2022 first-round pick.

4.The Trade: Charlotte Hornets acquire Steven Adams from the Oklahoma City Thunder for Terry Rozier

5.The Trade: Chicago Bulls acquire Tobias Harris, unprotected 2022 first-round pick and a 2020 second-round pick from the Philadelphia 76ers for Otto Porter Jr. (opt-in)

6.The Trade: Cleveland Cavaliers acquire Harrison Barnes, Jabari Parker and swap rights on a 2021 first-round pick from the Sacramento Kings for Kevin Love

7.The Trade: Dallas Mavericks acquire Josh Richardson from the Philadelphia 76ers for Seth Curry and the No. 18 pick in the 2020 draft
8.The Trade: Denver Nuggets acquire Jrue Holiday from the New Orleans Pelicans for Gary Harris, Will Barton and a 2020 first-round pick (via Houston Rockets)

9.he Trade: Detroit Pistons acquire Andre Iguodala, Kelly Olynyk (opt-in) and the No. 20 pick in 2020 from the Miami Heat for Derrick Rose

10.The Trade: Golden State Warriors acquire Robert Covington from the Houston Rockets for $17.2 million TPE and an unprotected 2022 first-round pick.

11.The Trade: Houston Rockets acquire Blake Griffin, a 2021 first-round pick (top-8 protected through 2023, converts to two second-rounders in 2024) and a 2023 second-round pick (via Portland Trail Blazers) from the Detroit Pistons for Russell Westbrook
12.The Trade: Indiana Pacers acquire Jrue Holiday and a 2021 second-round pick (via Washington Wizards) from the New Orleans Pelicans for Myles Turner and Doug McDermott

13.The Trade: Los Angeles Clippers acquire Jalen Brunson from the Dallas Mavericks for Landry Shamet

14.The Trade: Los Angeles Lakers acquire Dennis Schroder from the Oklahoma City Thunder for Kyle Kuzma

15.The Trade: Memphis Grizzlies acquire Patty Mills from the San Antonio Spurs for Kyle Anderson

16.The Trade: Miami Heat acquire LaMarcus Aldridge from the San Antonio Spurs for Andre Iguodala, Kelly Olynyk and a 2022 second-round pick (via Philadelphia 76ers)

17.The Trade: Milwaukee Bucks acquire Chris Paul from the Oklahoma City Thunder for Eric Bledsoe, Ersan Ilyasova, Robin Lopez, Donte DiVincenzo and Milwaukee's 2020 first-round pick

18.The Trade: Minnesota Timberwolves acquire Dennis Schroder from the Oklahoma City Thunder for James Johnson (opt-in) and a 2022 second-round pick

19.The Trade: New Orleans Pelicans acquire Tyler Herro, Kendrick Nunn, Kelly Olynyk (opt-in) and a 2020 first-round pick (No. 30 overall) from the Miami Heat for Jrue Holiday

20.The Trade: New York Knicks acquire Chris Paul from the Oklahoma City Thunder for Frank Ntilikina, Wayne Ellington and a 2020 first-round pick (via Los Angeles Clippers)

21.The Trade: Orlando Magic acquire No. 2 pick in the 2020 draft from the Golden State Warriors for Aaron Gordon and the No. 15 pick in the 2020 draft
